title: worktree-merge: Parent branch tracking
description:
Add ParentBranch tracking to Worktree struct and Manager

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-24-worktree-merge/2026-01-24-worktree-merge-spec.md`
**GitHub Issue:** #4

**Key files for this epic:**
- `internal/worktree/worktree.go` - Worktree struct and Manager implementation
- `internal/worktree/worktree_test.go` - Existing tests to extend

**Changes:**
1. Add ParentBranch field to Worktree struct
2. Add metadata helpers (worktreeMetadata struct, writeMetadata, readMetadata, getCurrentBranch)
3. Update Manager.Create() to detect and store parent branch
4. Update Manager.List() to read metadata and populate ParentBranch
